posts.title: Support
posts.text: CutClip can help you to collect and save web pages whenever you are surfing the internet in Safari. You can share, edit the offline pages whenever you like. For usage guide, please refer the user help in the app. Feel free to send me any comments or questions by email cutclip@outlook.com. Weâ€™d like to hear from you.

posts.title: CutClip
posts.text: CutClip can help you to collect and save web pages whenever you are surfing the internet in Safari. You can share, edit the offline pages whenever you like. Features: Quick action in Safari Save and share web pages for offline reading Support dark mode Featuresaction in Safari save web page Offline page List Reading Offline Reading Offline in Dark Mode

posts.title: Privacy Policy
posts.text: Privacy Policy for the Cut and ClipLast updated: 02/26/2021 We are the developers of Cut and Clip. This privacy policy describes how we process your personal information and which privacy rights you have when you are using Cut and Clip. Please contact us at the contact information below if you have any questions or comments. Personal Information Collection and Use Personal Information Sharing Tracking Technologies Social Logins In-app Purchase Information Policy Changes Accessibility Contact Us Personal Information Collection and UseWe may receive technical information about your device, for example, its IP address or operating system. Personal Information SharingWe do not share any personal information. Tracking TechnologiesNeither Cut and Clip nor any third party services are using tracking technologies. Social LoginsCut and Clip does not use any social login functionality. In-app Purchase InformationCut and Clip does not process any in-app purchase information. Policy ChangesWhen we make material changes to this privacy policy, for example, due to app updates or changes in the law, we will post the updated policy here. The policy will always apply in the version at the time of your use of Cut and Clip even if you downloaded Cut and Clip at a time when a previous policy version was applicable. AccessibilityThis website conforms to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1. However, if you are having difficulties obtaining information from it, please contact us at the contact information below. We will try to make the information available to you in another format and answer any question that you may have. Contact UsPlease contact us if you have any questions or concerns. cutclip@outlook.com
